item.title: So how about we all play a specific world and join MSCP Clan Chat?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:16, topic:494832”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=613064.msg4242488#msg4242488 date=1361904645]

I’ve been on Foz a few times on my secret account; many lulz were had watching the bickering

I have an idea who it was if it was you. There’s a guy who joins and never speaks with no rank etc lol wont post name here cause it’s supposed to be a secret. Also, there’s almost never any bickering so I’m glad you pulled that our your arse
[/quote]It’s lulzy bickering, not anger bickering. And feel free to post the name if you think you know who I am :O[/quote]
enucskiller or whatever it is, it’s something like that anyway. He never talks, didn’t post his name here etc. CAN ONLY BE DAVID

Read full topic

item.title: So how about we all play a specific world and join MSCP Clan Chat?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

We already operate a general chat clan for most MoparScape members. We’re on world 311 (less lag, less players) and the “Foz” clan chat. Some of us are members of a proper clan but others just come for chatting & questing etc. Had around 15-20 moparians in it last night :o

Read full topic
